entry.title: 5/1 - The Cherry Valley Summer Sculpture Trail 2019
entry.content:
Cherry Valley Artworks
üìç Cherry Valley, NY, United States
üé® Sculpture
üìÖ 05/01/2019 deadline
üí∞ unknown fee
‚û° Apply


====== DESCRIPTION ======

Sculptures will be exhibited along Main Street in the beautiful and historic town of Cherry Valley, NY. Situated in the heart of a major summer tourist destination the sculpture trail attracts a large audience of both locals and visitors. The show is curated by Sculpture Space board member and Professor at Sculpture and 3-D design at Munson- Proctor, Daniel Buckingham. Past trails have included artists from as far away as South Korea and Iran.
Both established and emerging artists are invited to apply. Existing, new or site specific works may be submitted for consideration. Works may or may not be offered for sale.


===== INSTRUCTIONS =====

Please go to ur website www.cvartworks.org and download submission guidelines and application form to accompany your entry.
